name: No More Room In Space
description:
No More Room In Space is a challenging adventure through space full of deadly pirates and angry rocks. Also there is no air in space, so don't expect any sounds, as I have made whole game in less then 15 hours. It was very fun experiment, especially becaouse I used Tilt Brush to create 3d assets. From my experience, someone with actuall art skill coud do an amazing job! :)

Your task is to withhold 5 minutes to survive. You have to be beware of rocks, flying at you, and try to dodge them. Alsother are evil ships attacking you from behind, which you have to blast down using one of your three guns, while you do that, you gain precious point which you can spend on different upgrades.

Controls:

WSAD - movement / when driving your ship, switching lanes

LMB - shooting

E - interaction

H - help

Ludum Dare Entry Page
